mapper.select: select a.no, a.title, a.contents,a.reg_date,a.hit,a.group_no, a.order_no, a.dept, b.no, b.name from board a, user b where a.user_no= b.no order by a.group_no DESC, a.order_no ASC
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents} where no=#{no}
update board set order_no=order_no+1 where group_no=#{groupNo} and order_no >=#{orderNo}
update board set hit=hit+1 where no=#{no}
